item.title: Paperfoo Intro
item.description: Welcome! Paperfoo is a project inspired by Adrian Colyer’s Morning Paper and the Papers We Love community. These are my goals for Paperfoo: Read 3-4 Computer Science papers per week Write summaries on this website Why am I doing this? BradfieldCS got me introduced to the idea of reading foundational papers. I want to develop a habit of consistently reading CS papers. Papers are great at exposing us to foundational as well as cutting edge research that some of the smartest people on the planet are working on.
